titleStmt.title: A love-token for mourners teaching spiritual dumbness and submission under Gods smarting rod : in two funeral sermons / by Samuel Fisher M.A., late preacher at Brides London, now at Thornton in Cheshire ; unto which is added, An antidote against the fear of death, being the meditations of the same author in a time and place of great mortality.
titleStmt.author: Fisher, Samuel, 1616 or 17-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for T. Underhill ..,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
Spiritual submission -- An antidote against the fear of death.
